Title: FLOSS Weekly 734: Organic Maps - Roman Tsisyk, Organic Maps
Description:
Doc Searls and Katherine Druckman talk with Roman Tsisyk, founder and top maintainer of Organic Maps, an extremely active and exciting open source project for people who like or need to travel off line and in privacy.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Katherine Druckman

Guest: Roman Tsisyk

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly

Think your open source project should be on FLOSS Weekly? Email floss@twit.tv.
